summary: priscilla presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all-new chapel of love in las vegas . the 69-year-old collaborated with nbc 's today show to launch a contest for one elvis-obsessed couple to win the ` ultimate wedding ' the winning duo will tie the knot at elvis presley 's graceland wedding chapel inside the westgate hotel on thursday , april 23 . elvis performed more than 830 sold-out shows .

aspect: 1. Priscilla Presley will be a witness at the first wedding at the all-new Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel in Westgate Hotel, Las Vegas.
2. The chapel was created in collaboration with NBC's Today show and features Priscilla Presley's involvement in its design.
3. The couple who wins a contest will wed at the chapel on April 23, and the ceremony will be attended by Priscilla Presley.
4. The winning couple will receive a free wedding reception, hotel suite, airfares, and concert tickets to the Elvis Experience theater show.
5. The chapel is part of the first permanent Graceland exhibit outside Elvis' home in Memphis, Tennessee.
6. The winning couple will be the first to wed at the Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel.
7. The contest submission must include a video or photos along with an explanation detailing why the couple deserves the prize.
explain: This aspect of the summary highlights Priscilla Presley's role as a witness at the first wedding to take place at the newly opened Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel in the Westgate Hotel, Las Vegas. As a special guest and former wife of Elvis Presley, Priscilla will have a significant presence at the event, adding a unique touch to the couple's big day.

To clarify the main concept or theme underlying the given aspect.

Priscilla Presley and NBC's Today show have collaborated to create an all-new Chapel of Love at the Westgate Hotel in Las Vegas. As part of this collaboration, Priscilla has been involved in the design of the chapel. The goal of this collaboration is to fulfill the dream of an elvis-obsessed couple to get married in the ultimate Elvis-inspired wedding. The winning couple will have the opportunity to wed at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel within the Westgate Hotel on April 23, 2023. This unique experience will be an unforgettable event, as the venue has a special significance, as it is where Elvis Presley performed over 830 sold-out shows during his career.

The core idea of the given aspect is that the couple who wins a contest will have the opportunity to get married at the all-new Chapel of Love in Las Vegas, with Priscilla Presley in attendance as a witness. This event will take place on April 23, 2023.

The winning couple in the contest who are elvis-obsessed will receive a number of perks as part of the "ultimate wedding" package. The perks include a free wedding reception, a free hotel suite for the wedding night, airfares to Las Vegas, and concert tickets to the Elvis Experience theater show. This is in addition to the opportunity to get married at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel on April 23.

The aspect highlights how the first wedding at the Chapel of Love in Las Vegas is connected to Graceland, as it is a part of the first permanent Graceland exhibit outside Elvis' home in Memphis, Tennessee. This connection allows the wedding to have a unique and special connection to the life and legacy of Elvis Presley.

The winning couple will be the first to wed at the Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel.

Summary: Priscilla Presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all-new chapel of love in Las Vegas. The 69-year-old collaborated with NBC's Today Show to launch a contest for one Elvis-obsessed couple to win the "ultimate wedding." The winning duo will tie the knot at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel on Thursday, April 23. Elvis performed more than 830 sold-out shows.

Aspect: 6. The winning couple will be the first to wed at the Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel.

The core idea of this aspect is that the winning couple, who will be the Elvis-obsessed couple selected through the contest, will have the privilege of being the first to hold their wedding ceremony at the Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel. This makes their wedding a special and memorable event, as they will be creating new memories in a historically significant venue, associated with the legacy of Elvis Presley.
